segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: Once, there was a strong, young hare who bragged about how fast he could run.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The wise tortoise thought he was a show-off so he asked the hare for a race.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The hare thought he would easily beat the tortoise.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: All of the animals gathered at the finish line to see who would win.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: As soon as the race started, the hare dashed ahead.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: After a little while, he stopped for a rest.

segments.speaker: hare
segments.text: “You are so slow, you will never win!”

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: he said to the tortoise.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The hare leaned against a tree.

segments.speaker: hare
segments.text: “That tortoise will never beat me!”

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: he laughed to himself.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The hare closed his eyes and soon, he was asleep.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The tortoise walked slowly past the hare.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: He didn’t give up until he got to the end of the race.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The animals cheered as they saw the tortoise.

segments.speaker: animals
segments.text: “Tortoise, you are the winner!”

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: they shouted happily.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The hare heard the cheering and woke up.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: He ran as fast as he could towards the finish line, but it was too late.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: The tortoise had already crossed the line.

segments.speaker: hare
segments.text: “It’s not fair!”

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: complained the hare.

segments.speaker: hare
segments.text: “We have to do the race again!”

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: But this time, no one listened to the hare.

segments.speaker: narrator
segments.text: Keep trying, even when things seem hard.
